name: Real Terrorist Strike
description:
The utmost awaited fps shooting game is ready to play. Let’s follow the set of survival rules in this frontline battle to gain vanity. Your duty as commando is to fight against the enemies who have destroyed the peace around the world.

Features:
• First Person Shooting
• Variety of modern weapons
• Challenging Missions to accomplish
• Addictive gameplay
• Top-notch sound effects
• Realistic Shooting Effect
• Amazing 3D graphics
